Why are you going to vote for John Kerry? As I see it, there are two possibilities...either you like John Kerry and think he'd make a good president...or you dislike George W Bush and will vote for Kerry simply because he's the only other viable alternative. I'm curious to see what the results are.
I may vote for Peter Pan.

I'm not voting in your poll because I'm voting for Bush. However, I believe your poll question is misworded. Kerry is not a viable choice. He will apparently be the Democratic candidate, but that does not make him a viable choice.
I'm only asking for people who are voting for Kerry. He is the only other real viable choice, because the election will almost certainly be between George W Bush and John Kerry.

And as far church does not belong in goverment. Bush has done well in pushing that issue. Come on give Kerry a chance he cant screw it up any more than this no brainer. Kerry all the way. I havent seen Bush address the high price of fuel to much well his daddy is getting rich off us.
